tweets.author: kotori
tweets.text:
The Great Wizard Crestomanci: Who is the Wizard
/Diana Wynne Jones
So fun I read it in one sitting!
The ones who shine are children with all sorts of problems. I'm utterly charmed by Jones's portrayal of people's diverse personalities. I read it with excitement, wondering when

thread_replies.author: 蒼
thread_replies.text:
百年の時効 / 伏尾美紀
#読了
昭和平成令和と引き継ぎながら事件に向き合う刑事たちの執念
それと共に描かれる昭和100年の歴史
自分の過去を振り返りながら読むと共に、両親、祖父母にまで想いを馳せる貴重な体験となった
壮大な傑作

thread_replies.author: ブロッコリー
thread_replies.text:
Ms. Ichie Kuchi's  
<The Queen's Midnight Snack Cafe>

There are days when I end up  
hugging my knees  
but  
"It's rude to the people  
who are supporting you"

I think I need to be grateful  
to the people around me  
and look forward

Above all, I'm happy  
that I got

thread_replies.author: まく本好き
thread_replies.text:
Let's go eat after all.  
Maha Harada  
#読了  
It's an essay that features delicious things from various places both in Japan and abroad, making my stomach growl like crazy. Maha Harada's love for food runs so deep. I deeply nod in agreement with what's written in the afterword:

thread_replies.author: はむこ₍ᐢ.ˬ.ᐢ₎読書垢
thread_replies.text:
#リデルハウスの子どもたち #佐原ひかり #読了

全寮制高校"リデルハウス"が舞台で
その中でも特別な才能がある
"ラヴ"と呼ばれる生徒達は
制約がある代わりに
"ギフト"を使い願いを叶える事が出来るーー。

おとぎ話の様な空気感、
古き良き風習が感じられる
凄く素敵な作品でした

#読書垢

thread_replies.author: 電撃オンライン
thread_replies.text:
Let's play the werewolf game with "#Frieren: Beyond Journey's End Werewolf" during the year-end and New Year's holidays!
https://dengekionline.com/article/202512/60762…
Find the demon tribe deceiving humanity and banish them with Zoltraak!
Number of players: 5 to 20 people  Play time: 10 to 50 minutes
